## Load libraries

```{r}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(parsnip)
```

## Modify penguins dataset

```{r}
penguins_filtered <- penguins |> 
  drop_na(ends_with("mm")) |> 
  select(species, ends_with("mm"), body_mass_g)
```

## Model fit

```{r}
model <- rand_forest() |>
  set_engine("ranger") |>
  set_mode("classification") |>
  fit(species ~ ., data = penguins_filtered)
```

## Model summary

```{r}
model
```



## Using {butcher}

Trim down the model object to only the necessary components

```{r}
library(butcher)
```

```{r}
# butcher::weigh(model)
# butcher::axe_call(model, verbose = TRUE)
model <- butcher::axe_fitted(model, verbose = TRUE)

# not much was removed since the object was already only 1.5 MB
```


## Save the model object

```{r}
# save the model as rds
saveRDS(model, here::here("R","model.rds"))
```
